page.title: 07EDUCATION:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: {Education}is provided for Ashleworth children from the age of four to eleven by the{village school.}Some children attend private or neighbouring schools.At the age of eleven children transfer to the {Comprehensive school}at Newent.The village school has 21 pupils.Due to a new housing estate numbers will increase in September.The{curriculum} includes Mathematics,English,Science, Geography,History,Art and Craft, Cookery,Religious Education,Physical Education,Games,Swimming and Music.Our school was built in 1842 and is in the centre of the village,facing the Village Green.Further Education is available at the Gloucestershire College of Art and Technology,situated on sites in Gloucester and Cheltenham. Evening classes are available there and also in Newent.
